name: Ronald Hove

education.title: Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science and Information Systems

about:
Hi 👋🏾, I am an engineer from Africa 🌍/ BuildingInAfrica, now turned Indie Founder

My goal is to connect with like-minded builders and creators from all over the world to help me build a better understanding of people and society in the AI era.

While I build my startup fima AI, I'm creating a knowledge repository for my mission and brand called R. O. N™ - Refactor. Our. Nation, contributing to building Africa through valuable, high quality data insights.

#BuildingInAfrica 🏗️ 🌱
